result.execSummary:
The defendant Mary M Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Issue of Worthless Checks(<=$2500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.24(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.  Defendant is to re-pay the costs for Court Appointed Counsel - TO BE DETERMINED.  On March 8, 2016 the Court determines the Court Appointed Counsel costs are $413.00.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

10:22 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jim Peebles.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Peebles - are prepared to proceed to plea & sentencing.  Court recites agreement - upon payment of restitution, will plea to the charge with court costs and DNA sample.  State concurs.  Atty Peebles concurs.  Defendant concurs.  Court questions regarding payment of restitution.  Statement by Atty Peebles - defendant has the money to pay the restitution today.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Peebles.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.
-Defendant is to re-pay the costs for court appointed counsel.

Court adjourned at 10:28 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 11-16-2015 09:45 am

9:35 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Jim Peebles present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Peebles - has an offer and defendant will accept offer.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on November 16, 2015 at 9:45 a.m.  Mandatory appearance or warrant.

Court adjourned at 9:36 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 10-12-2015 09:00 am
Plea/sentencing hearing at 10-12-2015 09:00 am

2:13 P.M.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jim Peebles.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Peebles - close to an agreement and requests a sentencing be scheduled.  Court will set for plea & sentencing on October 12, 2015 at 9:00 a.m.

Court adjourned at 2:14 p.m.
Status hearing at 08-24-2015 02:00 pm

to the defendant - request for court appointed counsel has been approved.  Court appoints Atty James Peebles.  Defendant to pay $70.00 per month for court appointed attorney fees and is to commence August 31, 2015 and every month thereafter.
and Order - Approved, signed by the judge

records.addlTxt:
8:53 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, does not qualify for PD representation and requests court appointed counsel.  Court questions defendant regarding income.  Statement by defendant - can afford $50 per month.  Court questions defendant regarding payments of $70 per month.  Defendant is to pay $70.00 per month commencing the end of August.  Court will appoint an attorney.

Court adjourned at 8:55 a.m.

Original warrant has been returned and destroyed.
43
Status hearing at 07-28-2015 08:30 am

1:44 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  Court notes bond has been set.  Court will set for Status Hearing on July 28, 2015 at 8:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 1:47 p.m.
Request to cancel with LN from GLSO today's date at 11:20 a.m.

11:04 a.m. Defendant in custody and present in court without counsel. Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin via phone.

Court questions defendant on her non appearance at prior court date. Defendant states that she had not appeared because she did not receive anything- provides current address of PO Box 662 Montello. Court question DA office on the address that was used. Statement that address was on the check and the defendant had signed certified mail from the business. DA makes bond recommendation. COURT orders $500.00 signature bond and defendant must appear for the future court date of July 13, 2015.

Court adjourned at 11:09 a.m.

Warrant sent down to GLSO on 07/09/2015.

Defendant called in regards to the missed court date and I informed her that she needed to appear.  Defendant was to call me back within a week as to when she could appear.
